attributes.additional_details:
Article 13 will soon come in to force in Europe and is designed to stop online content creators from using copyright content from other creator including both large companies and small independent creators.
But also Article 13 and Article 11 will also take away your right to freedom of Speech.
Article 11 effects your rights to comment on News and react to news stories.
Article 13 will take away your right as a musician to cover a song in your own way.
attributes.background:
Article 13 and Article 11 will take away your voice and restrict your freedom of Speech.
Although designed to protect creators, they are also designed to stop you expressing your creativity online in Video, Song, Spoken Word and may close down social media platforms to Europe.
